Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes Rockland county to qualify for the empire state film production credit
Summary: Authorizes Rockland county to qualify for the empire state film production credit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the number of counties in which services can be performed to qualify for the empire state film production credit
